title: I feel horrible right now
content: In a class of 25 students I was among the 5. And for today's paper I really worked hard. On there website it was written that 11th and 12th class cbse questions will come so I assumed tht a little bit of high level might come but idk. I tried copying from my neighbor as he said he scores 95 percentile but thn he started hiding his screen lol I don't blame him. But basically I tbh don't know wht to say I was about to cry in the middle of the exam because I studied more thn 12 hours everyday too. I'm sorry I don't want any consolation but idk wht to do so thts y I'm writing this considering the fact tht pes was my last option.

comments.body: Wait till ranks come out bruh, you can still get cse at ec campus at like 3.2 k chill out.
Wht makes you think I'll get 3.2 rank
and how many people write this exam ?
20000 around ig - says google
My friend gave for fun and is now sitting at ec campus rn
My luck is shit
that time PESSAT didn't have negative marking
Abe now everyone will have no why y'all worrying

I'm not worrying, PESU via pessat honestly ain't worth it, according to me

but I was telling that tukha marega toh bhi marks nahi ayega if the answer is wrong ;)

1st para true.
2nd idk not giving this yearü•∞
i'll get below 20000 lol i literally just played  guessing game lmfao fml
Bro, tbh i wrote the paper without studying, and i got a seat in pes cse
Ik my life sucks lol
Hope for the best üôÇ
Many people got in through pessat when there was no negative marking. Now I can't be sure cuz the guessing game backfires with the negative marking in place
Wait i am sorry i couldn't comprehend it well does it mean it was easier than expected or more on the tough side ? I have my exam day after tomorrowüò¨
You've got this dw you'll score good. Matt do dhyan meri baat pe I'm not worth it
You forgot to check my DM :P

i gave exam today and did 108 questions only with some 15 question 50-50 guesses...so is this enough for main campus cse or it   
i know its tough to say still give me honest answer what you think
You're such a pervert. U should be happy tht I didn't ss it and put it up here
You'll get it bhai. 108 toh kaafi shi hai
You're lucky negative marking didn't exist back then
bro negatives hoge kaafi zyada and last year 110 gaya tha for cse

Is pes that easy tho üò≠

Idk always had this image that getting into pes / rv, esp via CET is like real hard lol
Hey dude, I remember talking to you. Its alright don‚Äôt be worried so soon, wait it out for the results and dw there‚Äôs always more options and paths
But ye log toh score release hi nhi krte
Well yeah but other paths are more tough atm
Yes but don‚Äôt look at it that way ki you can‚Äôt do. Pessat mai Jo hua woh hogaya . Let it not have impact on the other ones no matter how much more tougher they are üí™üèª
Bahut padhliya abh literally Himmat nhi bachi
Ayy you‚Äôve come too far to drop it now, bas thoda aur ü´Ç
reddit pe kisi senior ne last year analyse kiya tha kaafi samples lekr

bro Pes is now charging nearly 5 lakhs for a seat through pessat 
do you really think it‚Äôs worth it??
Many of my friends don‚Äôt have a job yet
(Including me)
I tried but fayda nhi huya idk logo ko kese aasan lgra idk
Iss baar negative marking hai toh bahut change ayega mere hisaab se

Pvt colleges ka toh abh utna hi jata h...
Govt milega nhi..

Well Chuck how they feel about it focus on yourself. Don‚Äôt feel like giving up on the rest because others are feeling ki easy hai and you‚Äôre not. Remember you‚Äôre doing this for yourself. What if the rest exams go better? Gotta try yk
What is the overall difficulty level of pessat? pls give some tips cause i have my pessat exam on 30th
Tbh idk dekha jaega merko btech hi krne ka man nhi krra abh
Bruh, decide Karle üóø
Tbh idk I found it difficult. Site pe unki cbse questions likha h but ghanta cbse tha
Abe taar comedk bacha h woh obv tough Hoga isse toh kru toh kya kru
Try Karle üò≠
How difficult is it? Cause I am doing past jee questions like before 2020
Yeah there was deleted part. Look try your best and merko batana ki jee questions krne ka fayda huya ya nhi :)
Bro now I feel like I won't be able to clear pessat also. My last option is also gone now

Merko dekhke please demotivate matt ho bro. Like I felt low isiliye mene woh para likh diya. I just wanted to know if yhe paper was really tough or is it just me and it seems like it is just me so chill prepare and be confident

Bro jee i didn't do well kcet also because of the syllabus issues and moreover I lost a close friend of mine a few days back.
Now Idk what will happen in pessat only, before my goal was bitsat but now I feel like giving up¬†
Tbh I've given up. I feel really exhausted and demotivated rn but I really didnt intend to demotivate anyone and still I'm hoping tht I get a decent rank atleast bcz I myself don't have any options..

Nah bro u didn't demotivate me. I demotivate myself tbh. I just regret working so hard for 2.5 years just to reach this stage. I thought if I would work I would make my mom proud but I failed in doing so..

If you worked hard for 2.5 years it will definitely payoff
And don't think tht way about yourself  you're capable of way more
Thanks for the encouragement bro. Really appreciate it üôè

Bro how hard is the maths in the paper? 
Chemistry and physics are too easy in pessat(atleats from the mocks I got) 

Just needed to know the difficulties of maths, like is it ncert lvl or slightly higher etc

Bro u graduated from pessat and don't have a job?
Like why, is ur cgpa low or is the college bad?
Should I take mit cce over it?
How much marks would I need for cse at ec and rr campus respectively?
Since its shift wise grading maybe ull get a good rank
They don't reveal marks and tbh for me ig it was a diceroll
Bro fr after jee prep last year gave pessat for fun and got a seat idk why these juniors are stressing so much for fkin pessat
Then also would like 110 ish cut it?

nah I came through cet and my cgpa is good too xD
the problem is the strength is too much
it gets really competitive to land a job when there are 1500 other applying for the same job

There are 1500 students for cse!!!!that's crazy 

Ig I might just end up taking cce from mit

they‚Äôve added ai ml too ig
the strength is even more now
No clue stop stressing about it and prep for remaining exams. Most of the people who write pessat get a seat dw
No bro i need cs otherwise my parents won't send me here
I got 95.81 percentile in jee will i get cse if i apply thru btech (jeemains only)?

Getting into any good college via CET is hard, meaning you have the right idea. When I wrote the exam years ago, the cutoff to get into my branch at PESU was 1200 through CET and around 300 for CSE.
It‚Äôs just that getting into PESU through PESSAT is a lot easier than through CET.
Check the jee cutoff once in pes website, it was somewhere above 97+ last time
Exactly soooo true, I see these kids and I laugh so bad üòÇ
It is kcet/comedk level, practice some pyqs from kcet/comedk, if you have time then try some jee mains math pyqs only, you will be fine üôÇ
It's not that hard... If you have prepared for jee, then you can write cet/pessat easily üòä
Yeah that's only for the main campus they combine placements for both main and second campus so the batch strength for cs is like 3küíÄ
Aha I see, a friend got cet ranking 2k smth and chose to go there so I was surprised lol
why tho
20 Lakhs for a B.Tech Degree is just too expensive
When I gave pessat 3 years ago, cs 1st round closed at 1.5k, second round at 2.2 k
I felt that my rank will be in 3-4k after the exam but ended up getting in 300s, you would've done better than you think...

Can't say anything, different batches different cut off, all depends on the kind of people that were present in your batch, they usually give out ranks relatively, and only ranks matter not that marks
maybe yall are just way too smart üò≠, scoring 95+ %iles in jee or smt
relatable asf
Aaj deke aaya bhai . Thik thak hi gya . But kya grand university h bhai infrastructure dekh ke man khush hogya
Dude should we do the deleted portions in chemistry like S block, Hydrogen, Solid state etc. for Pessat?

No bro just do whatever you have done until now . I saw one or two out of syllabus questions but won't recommend putting efforts for those now . The above-mentioned chapters toh i didn't see even one question .

bruh not everyone's a topper lol, cet was messed up this year and the only hope for us is pessat   
plus there's negative marking this year
How did it go for you
Ayy chill you all are smart too üòé
Oh i doubt
üòê
